blogPost.title:
I keep seeing ppl talking about the “Buffett indicator” that clearly shows we’re in a bubble

Munger said a few years ago Buffett doesn’t believe in this thing anymore https://t.co/I1Zj8DxL1H
blogPost.author: Ben Carlson

localize.full_text:
我一直看到人们在谈论 "巴菲特指标"，这清楚地表明我们正处于泡沫之中。

芒格几年前就说过巴菲特不相信这个东西了https://t.co/I1Zj8DxL1H。

我一直看到人們在談論 "巴菲特指標"，這清楚地表明我們正處於泡沫之中。

芒格幾年前就說過巴菲特不相信這個東西了https://t.co/I1Zj8DxL1H。

previous.excerpt:
I was telling him I mess around with the stock market some and he said he would
give me $100 to start off and try and build up the $100 then we could split it.
I just don’t know what I should put it in. One stock? Or break it up and put it
in different stock?
previous.title: My grandpas giving me $100 to invest in stocks.

localize.title: 我爷爷给我100块钱投资股票。
localize.the_new_excerpt:
我跟他说我在股市上乱来，他说他会的。
给我100美元开始，并尝试建立100美元，然后我们可以分割它。
我只是不知道我应该把它放在什么地方。一只股票？还是把它拆开，把它
在不同的股票？

localize.title: 我爺爺給我100塊錢投資股票。
localize.the_new_excerpt:
我跟他說我在股市上亂來，他說他會的。
給我100美元開始，並嘗試建立100美元，然後我們可以分割它。
我只是不知道我應該把它放在什麼地方。一隻股票？還是把它拆開，把它
在不同的股票？

your life.

Instead of making a new thread, please post your questions here. (E.g. "Which
crayon do I fill the form with?")
